DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate safety efficacy GORE® CARDIOFORM ASD Occluder percutaneous closure ostium secundum atrial septal defect ( ASDs )
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Transcatheter Closure Ostium Secundum ASDs
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , multicenter , single-arm clinical study compare outcome GORE® CARDIOFORM ASD Occluder performance goal derive clinical investigation outcome device indicate ASD closure .
DOC.criteria: Appropriate ASD anatomy Note : Additional Inclusion Criteria may apply Absence concurrent cardiac condition could elevate morbidity/mortality beyond common ASD Note : Additional Exclusion Criteria may apply
